trans-unit.source: Download the Azure SDK for PHP
trans-unit.target: Download the Azure SDK for PHP

trans-unit.source: Learn how to download and install the Azure SDK for PHP.
trans-unit.target: Learn how to download and install the Azure SDK for PHP.

trans-unit.source: The Azure SDK for PHP includes components that allow you to develop, deploy, and manage PHP applications for Azure.
trans-unit.target: The Azure SDK for PHP includes components that allow you to develop, deploy, and manage PHP applications for Azure.

trans-unit.source: Specifically, the Azure SDK for PHP includes the following:
trans-unit.target: Specifically, the Azure SDK for PHP includes the following:

trans-unit.source: The PHP client libraries for Azure.
trans-unit.target: The PHP client libraries for Azure.

trans-unit.source: These class libraries provide an interface for accessing Azure features, such as data management services and cloud services.
trans-unit.target: These class libraries provide an interface for accessing Azure features, such as data management services and cloud services.

trans-unit.source: The Azure Command-Line Interface for Mac, Linux, and Windows (Azure CLI).
trans-unit.target: The Azure Command-Line Interface for Mac, Linux, and Windows (Azure CLI).

trans-unit.source: This is a set of commands for deploying and managing Azure services, such as Azure Websites and Azure Virtual Machines.
trans-unit.target: This is a set of commands for deploying and managing Azure services, such as Azure Websites and Azure Virtual Machines.

trans-unit.source: The Azure CLI work on any platform, including Mac, Linux, and Windows.
trans-unit.target: The Azure CLI work on any platform, including Mac, Linux, and Windows.

trans-unit.source: Azure PowerShell (Windows Only).
trans-unit.target: Azure PowerShell (Windows Only).

trans-unit.source: This is a set of PowerShell cmdlets for deploying and managing Azure Services, such as Cloud Services and Virtual Machines.
trans-unit.target: This is a set of PowerShell cmdlets for deploying and managing Azure Services, such as Cloud Services and Virtual Machines.

trans-unit.source: The Azure Emulators (Windows Only).
trans-unit.target: The Azure Emulators (Windows Only).

trans-unit.source: The compute and storage emulators are local emulators of cloud services and data management services that allow you to test an application locally.
trans-unit.target: The compute and storage emulators are local emulators of cloud services and data management services that allow you to test an application locally.

trans-unit.source: The Azure Emulators run on Windows only.
trans-unit.target: The Azure Emulators run on Windows only.

trans-unit.source: The sections below describe how to download and install the components described above.
trans-unit.target: The sections below describe how to download and install the components described above.

trans-unit.source: The instructions in this topic assume that you have <linkText>PHP[install-php]</linkText><title></title> installed.
trans-unit.target: The instructions in this topic assume that you have <linkText>PHP[install-php]</linkText><title></title> installed.

trans-unit.source: You must have PHP 5.3 or higher to use the PHP client libraries for Azure.
trans-unit.target: You must have PHP 5.3 or higher to use the PHP client libraries for Azure.

trans-unit.source: The PHP Client Libraries for Azure provide an interface for accessing Azure features, such as data management services and cloud services, from any operating system.
trans-unit.target: The PHP Client Libraries for Azure provide an interface for accessing Azure features, such as data management services and cloud services, from any operating system.

trans-unit.source: These libraries can be installed via the Composer or PEAR package managers or manually.
trans-unit.target: These libraries can be installed via the Composer or PEAR package managers or manually.

trans-unit.source: For information about how to use the PHP Client Libraries for Azure, see <linkText>How to Use the Blob Service[blob-service]</linkText><title></title>, <linkText>How to Use the Table Service[table-service]</linkText><title></title> and <linkText>How to Use the Queue Service[queue-service]</linkText><title></title>.
trans-unit.target: For information about how to use the PHP Client Libraries for Azure, see <linkText>How to Use the Blob Service[blob-service]</linkText><title></title>, <linkText>How to Use the Table Service[table-service]</linkText><title></title> and <linkText>How to Use the Queue Service[queue-service]</linkText><title></title>.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Install Git[install-git]</linkText><title></title>.
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Install Git[install-git]</linkText><title></title>.

trans-unit.source: On Windows, you will also need to add the Git executable to your PATH environment variable.
trans-unit.target: On Windows, you will also need to add the Git executable to your PATH environment variable.

trans-unit.source: Create a file named composer.json in the root of your project and add the following code to it:
trans-unit.target: Create a file named composer.json in the root of your project and add the following code to it:

trans-unit.source: Download **<linkText>composer.phar[composer-phar]</linkText><title></title>** in your project root.
trans-unit.target: Download **<linkText>composer.phar[composer-phar]</linkText><title></title>** in your project root.

trans-unit.source: Open a command prompt and execute this in your project root
trans-unit.target: Open a command prompt and execute this in your project root

trans-unit.source: To install the PHP Client Libraries for Azure as a PEAR package, follow these steps:
trans-unit.target: To install the PHP Client Libraries for Azure as a PEAR package, follow these steps:

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Install PEAR[install-pear]</linkText><title></title>.
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Install PEAR[install-pear]</linkText><title></title>.

trans-unit.source: Set-up the Azure PEAR channel:
trans-unit.target: Set-up the Azure PEAR channel:

trans-unit.source: Install the PEAR package:
trans-unit.target: Install the PEAR package:

trans-unit.source: After the installation completes, you can reference class libraries from your application.
trans-unit.target: After the installation completes, you can reference class libraries from your application.

trans-unit.source: To download and install the PHP Client Libraries for Azure manually, follow these steps:
trans-unit.target: To download and install the PHP Client Libraries for Azure manually, follow these steps:

trans-unit.source: Download a .zip archive that contains the libraries from <linkText>GitHub[php-sdk-github]</linkText><title></title>.
trans-unit.target: Download a .zip archive that contains the libraries from <linkText>GitHub[php-sdk-github]</linkText><title></title>.

trans-unit.source: Alternatively, fork the repository and clone it to your local machine.
trans-unit.target: Alternatively, fork the repository and clone it to your local machine.

trans-unit.source: (The latter option requires a GitHub account and having Git installed locally.)
trans-unit.target: (The latter option requires a GitHub account and having Git installed locally.)

trans-unit.source: The PHP Client Libraries for Azure have a dependency on the [HTTPRequest2](http://pear.php.net/package/HTTPRequest2), [Mailmime](http://pear.php.net/package/Mailmime), and [MailmimeDecode](http://pear.php.net/package/MailmimeDecode) PEAR packages.
trans-unit.target: The PHP Client Libraries for Azure have a dependency on the [HTTPRequest2](http://pear.php.net/package/HTTPRequest2), [Mailmime](http://pear.php.net/package/Mailmime), and [MailmimeDecode](http://pear.php.net/package/MailmimeDecode) PEAR packages.

trans-unit.source: The recommended way to resolve these dependencies is to install these packages using the <linkText>PEAR package manager</linkText><title></title>
trans-unit.target: The recommended way to resolve these dependencies is to install these packages using the <linkText>PEAR package manager</linkText><title></title>

trans-unit.source: Copy the WindowsAzure directory of the downloaded archive to your application directory structure and reference classes from your application.
trans-unit.target: Copy the WindowsAzure directory of the downloaded archive to your application directory structure and reference classes from your application.

trans-unit.source: Azure PowerShell is a set of PowerShell cmdlets for deploying and managing Azure Services (such as Cloud Services and Virtual Machines).
trans-unit.target: Azure PowerShell is a set of PowerShell cmdlets for deploying and managing Azure Services (such as Cloud Services and Virtual Machines).

trans-unit.source: The Azure Emulators are emulators of cloud services and data management services that allow you to test an application locally.
trans-unit.target: The Azure Emulators are emulators of cloud services and data management services that allow you to test an application locally.

trans-unit.source: These components are supported Windows only.
trans-unit.target: These components are supported Windows only.

trans-unit.source: The recommended way to install Azure PowerShell and the Azure Emulators is to use the <linkText>Microsoft Web Platform Installer[download-wpi]</linkText><title></title>.
trans-unit.target: The recommended way to install Azure PowerShell and the Azure Emulators is to use the <linkText>Microsoft Web Platform Installer[download-wpi]</linkText><title></title>.

trans-unit.source: Note that you can also choose to install other development components, such as PHP, SQL Server, the Microsoft Drivers for SQL Server for PHP, and WebMatrix.
trans-unit.target: Note that you can also choose to install other development components, such as PHP, SQL Server, the Microsoft Drivers for SQL Server for PHP, and WebMatrix.

trans-unit.source: For information about how to use Azure PowerShell, see <linkText>How to Use Azure PowerShell[powershell-tools]</linkText><title></title>.
trans-unit.target: For information about how to use Azure PowerShell, see <linkText>How to Use Azure PowerShell[powershell-tools]</linkText><title></title>.

trans-unit.source: The Azure CLI is a set of commands for deploying and managing Azure services, such as Azure Websites and Azure Virtual Machines.
trans-unit.target: The Azure CLI is a set of commands for deploying and managing Azure services, such as Azure Websites and Azure Virtual Machines.

trans-unit.source: For information about installing Azure CLI, see <linkText>Install the Azure CLI</linkText><title></title>.
trans-unit.target: For information about installing Azure CLI, see <linkText>Install the Azure CLI</linkText><title></title>.
